newsitem.title: CANADA: Repap says to issue release on Monday.
newsitem.headline: Repap says to issue release on Monday.

text.p: Repap Enterprises Inc said on Friday that it would issue a press release on Monday.

A company official told Reuters that Stephen Larson, president and chief operating officer, was in meetings most of Friday and that company officials were preparing a news release for Monday. Larson was not available for comment and the official declined to comment on the content of the release.
On Wednesday, Repap said it was examining alternatives to maximizing shareholder value after the failed C$2.6 billion merger on March 26 with Avenor Inc.

On Friday, Repap shares lost half their value on the Toronto Stock Exchange, declining 0.54 to 0.55 on a volume of more than 15 million shares, amid investor worries about financially troubled company's future.
